ai_prompt:
You are a professional job application assistant. Based on the job description and resume provided, generate a concise email.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone
3. Body should
Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body".

Subject should be
Application for [role name] (Location).

Signature at end of email should be.
Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

Please format the email body with proper line breaks:
- One line break after the greeting
- Double line breaks between paragraphs
- One line break before the signature
- Use \n for line breaks
- Make sure to format the body same like below example response but alter according to jd

Example format:
Hello ,\n\n[Paragraph 1]\n\n[Paragraph 2]\n\nBest regards,\n[Your Name]

Example response:

Hello,

I hope you‚Äôre doing well.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Senior Java Microservices Engineer (Cloud-Native | Reactive Systems) position in Sunnyvale, CA. I‚Äôm very interested in this opportunity and believe my experience aligns closely with the role requirements.

I have over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable, cloud-native, and microservices-based enterprise applications using Java (8‚Äì17), Spring Boot, and distributed systems architecture. My technical background also includes hands-on expertise with Kubernetes, Docker, GCP, Azure, and messaging frameworks such as Kafka.

Some highlights from my experience include:

- Designing reactive, fault-tolerant microservices using Spring Boot, WebFlux, and Camel.

- Deploying and scaling microservices on Kubernetes and cloud platforms (Azure & GCP).

- Working with Oracle, Cassandra, and Cosmos DB for distributed data processing.

- Implementing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git, ensuring high code quality through JUnit, Mockito, and TDD practices.

- Strong focus on performance tuning, multithreading, and high availability in distributed systems.


Please find my updated resume attached for your review. I would love the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your client‚Äôs needs.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

{Signature}
email_subject: Application for Java Full Stack Developer with AWS exp (Chicago, IL)
email_body:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Java Full Stack Developer position with AWS experience in Chicago, IL. I am excited about this opportunity and feel that my experience closely aligns with the requirements of the role.

I bring expertise in full-stack development, particularly in Java, along with hands-on experience in AWS services. My background includes building scalable applications, implementing cloud solutions, and collaborating effectively in cross-functional teams.

Some key highlights from my experience:
- Developing end-to-end applications using Java, Spring Boot, and Angular for seamless user experiences.
- Integrating AWS services like EC2, S3, and Lambda for cloud-native solutions.
- Collaborating with stakeholders to define technical requirements and deliver high-quality software products.
- Ensuring code quality through automated testing and continuous integration practices.

I have attached my updated resume for your review. I am keen on discussing how my skills can contribute to your team's success.

Looking forward to the opportunity to further discuss my application.

Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

job_description:
GC/USC ONLY
Java Fullstack Tech Lead
Rocklin, CA

Requirements
6+ years of professional software development experience.
2+ years in a technical leadership or team lead role.
Proven experience with both frontend and backend development.
Strong proficiency in modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue).
Solid backend experience with Node.js, Python, Java, or similar.
Deep understanding of RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and system design.
Strong working knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases.
Experience with cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, Git workflows, and agile development practices.
Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills

Please send me the resume at bharat@talentvista.us

job_description:
Apply Now

Job Title: Senior Java Full Stack Developer
Experience: 5+ Years
Location: Dallas, TX( Onsite)
Employment Type: Contract 

Job Summary

We are seeking a highly experienced Senior Java Full Stack Developer to design, develop, and maintain scalable enterprise applications. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in Java backend development along with modern frontend frameworks, cloud-native architecture, and CI/CD practices. You will collaborate closely with product owners, architects, and cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

Key Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain enterprise-grade full stack applications
Build scalable and high-performance RESTful and/or GraphQL APIs
Develop backend services using Java, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring Security
Develop responsive and user-friendly UIs using Angular / React / Vue.js
Work with microservices architecture and event-driven systems
Ensure application security, performance, and scalability
Participate in architecture discussions and technical design reviews
Write clean, testable, and well-documented code
Perform code reviews and mentor junior developers
Collaborate with DevOps teams for build, release, and deployment automation
Support production systems and troubleshoot issues as needed

Required Skills & Qualifications

*Backend (Core)*
10+ years of hands-on experience in Java/J2EE development
Strong experience with Spring Boot, Spring Framework, Hibernate/JPA
Experience building Microservices-based architectures
Strong knowledge of REST APIs, JSON, and API security (OAuth2, JWT)

*Frontend*
Strong experience with Angular / React / Vue.js
Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript
Experience integrating frontend with backend APIs


*Databases*
Strong experience with Relational Databases (Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL)
Experience with NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Cassandra, DynamoDB)
Strong SQL and performance tuning skills


*Cloud & DevOps*
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS / Azure / GCP)
Experience with Docker, Kubernetes
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps)
Experience with monitoring and logging tools

Mail: anju@openclouditsolutions.com
